episodes.title: A Good Opportunity
episodes.plot: Season Two premiere. After rejecting Murray for spending too much time with another band, Bret and Jemaine find success managing themselves and land a deal to record an ad jingle; Dave shares his 'double-down' deal strategy.

episodes.title: New Cup
episodes.plot: Bret and Jemaine's fortunes unravel after Bret buys a new tea cup. With emergency band funds unavailable, Jemaine takes desperate measures in hopes of supplementing their income.

episodes.title: The Tough Brets
episodes.plot: Bret organizes a gang to protect himself from rappers he dissed in a song; Murray and Jemaine get their feelings hurt by Aussie counterparts; Mel paints a portrait Jemaine can't get rid of.

episodes.title: Murray Takes It to the Next Level
episodes.plot: Murray tries to elevate Bret and Jemaine on his friendship graph, bringing his questioning pal Jim in on the plan; Mel demands an apology from Bret for inappropriate dream behavior.

episodes.title: Unnatural Love
episodes.plot: Jemaine starts dating an Australian, to Bret's dismay and inconvenience.

episodes.title: Love Is a Weapon of Choice
episodes.plot: Bret and Jemaine both fall for a woman whose missing dog has epilepsy, triggering a duel, a canine benefit, and a couple of new tunes.

episodes.title: Prime Minister
episodes.plot: Foiled by the White House, Murray arranges a presidential meeting for the visiting Prime Minister of New Zealand; a tribute gig ends with Jemaine getting mixed up with an Art Garfunkel fanatic.

episodes.title: New Zealand Town
episodes.plot: Trying to look cool for a gig at the Grand Opening of New York's one-block New Zealand enclave, the Conchords end up getting hooked on hair gel.

episodes.title: Wingmen
episodes.plot: Bret enlists Jemaine and Dave to help him try to land a girlfriend; Murray regrets making Greg his scapegoat.

episodes.title: Evicted
episodes.plot: Season Two finale. Unable to pay off their back rent, Bret and Jermaine move in with Mel and Doug; Murray looks to cash in on a stage play about the Conchords' travails.
